Interface ec.evm.Vat

public interface interface Vat
extends ClaLoader
A Vat is an object which has control of an objectspace. There are only a few operations one can do on a Vat directly. As a ClassLoader, a Vat represents its primordial class loader.

attrib$deflectorName
Attribute to indicate the name of the deflector class for this interface.

checkpoint(OutputStream)
Perform a checkpoint to the given stream.
egc()
Perform EGC.
introduceLeaf(String, Tether)
Introduce a named (sturdy) leaf to the vat.
introduceLeaf(Tether)
Introduce an unnamed (fragile) leaf to the vat.
nameRoot(String, Object)
Give a name to a root.
terminate()
Terminate this vat.
unnameRoot(String)
Un-name a root.

attrib$deflectorName 
 public static final String attrib$deflectorName
Attribute to indicate the name of the deflector class for this interface.

nameRoot 
 public abstract void nameRoot(String name,
                               Object root)
Give a name to a root. A vat client must use this method if it wants to re-establish a connection with the root in question between quakes. Note that the root passed is generally a Deflector of some sort. The EVM uses its omnipotent opener to reach in and find the actual Inhabitant to name.

Parameters:
name - the name to give
root - the alleged root
Throws: IllegalArgumentException
thrown if name is null or if root is not in fact a deflected inhabitant of this vat.
unnameRoot 
 public abstract void unnameRoot(String name)
Un-name a root.

Parameters:
name - the name to forget
introduceLeaf 
 public abstract void introduceLeaf(Tether leaf)
Introduce an unnamed (fragile) leaf to the vat. When the given tether is passed into the vat, it is wrapped with an appropriate deflector by the intervat-communication system.

Parameters:
leaf - the introduced leaf
Throws: IllegalArgumentException
thrown if the leaf is not an appropriate type to be introduced into the vat
introduceLeaf 
 public abstract void introduceLeaf(String name,
                                    Tether leaf)
Introduce a named (sturdy) leaf to the vat. When the given tether is passed into the vat, it is wrapped with an appropriate deflector by the intervat-communication system.

Parameters:
name - the name for the leaf
leaf - the introduced leaf
egc 
 public abstract void egc()
Perform EGC.

checkpoint 
 public abstract void checkpoint(OutputStream stream)
Perform a checkpoint to the given stream.

Parameters:
stream - the stream to output checkpoint information to.
terminate 
 public abstract void terminate()
Terminate this vat.
